resources:
Primary - base color #0A1A31
On-primary - is applied to content (icons, text, etc.) that sits on top of primary #835641 #CD8D56
Primary container - is applied to elements needing less emphasis than primary #28527A
On-primary container - is applied to content (icons, text, etc.) that sits on top of primary container #E2F2FF
#FFBB86FC #FF6200EE #FF3700B3 #FF03DAC5 #FF018786 #FF000000 #FFFFFFFF
